testbed_description: Test the compliance of a DRS implementation with GA4GH DRS v1.2.0 specification

phases.phase_description: run all the tests for service_info endpoint

tests.test_name: Run test cases on the service-info endpoint; auth_type = basic
tests.test_description: validate service-info status code, content-type and response schemas

cases.case_name: Service Info response status code validation
cases.case_description: Check if the response status code is 200

cases.case_name: Service Info response content-type validation
cases.case_description: Check if the content-type is application/json

cases.case_name: Service Info response schema validation
cases.case_description: Validate Service Info response schema when status = 200

phases.phase_description: run all the tests for drs object info endpoint

tests.test_name: Run test cases on the drs object info endpoint for drs id = 697907bf-d5bd-433e-aac2-1747f1faf366; auth_type = basic
tests.test_description: validate drs object status code, content-type and response schemas

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info response status code validation
cases.case_description: Check if the response status code is 200

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info response content-type validation
cases.case_description: Check if the content-type is application/json

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info response schema validation
cases.case_description: Validate DRS Object Info response schema when status = 200

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info has access information
cases.case_description: Validate that DRS Object Info response has access_methods field provided and that it is non-empty
cases.message: 'access_methods' is provided and it is non-empty.

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info has access information
cases.case_description: Validate that each access_method in the access_methods field of the DRS Object Info response has atleast one of 'access_url'or 'access_id' provided
cases.message: At least 'access_url' or 'access_id' is provided in all access_methods

Failed validating 'required' in schema:
    {'additionalProperties': True,
     'properties': {'access_methods': {'description': 'The list of access '
                                                      'methods that can be '
                                                      'used to fetch the '
                                                      '`DrsObject`.\n'
                                                      'Required for single '
                                                      'blobs; optional for '
                                                      'bundles.',
                                       'items': {'$ref': 'access_method.json#/definitions/access_method'},
                                       'minItems': 1,
                                       'type': 'array'},
                    'aliases': {'description': 'A list of strings that can '
                                               'be used to find other '
                                               'metadata about this '
                                               '`DrsObject` from external '
                                               'metadata sources. These '
                                               'aliases can be used to '
                                               'represent secondary '
                                               'accession numbers or '
                                               'external GUIDs.',
                                'items': {'type': 'string'},
                                'type': 'array'},
                    'checksums': {'description': 'The checksum of the '
                                                 '`DrsObject`. At least '
                                                 'one checksum must be '
                                                 'provided. For blobs, the '
                                                 'checksum is computed '
                                                 'over the bytes in the '
                                                 'blob. For bundles, the '
                                                 'checksum is computed '
                                                 'over a sorted '
                                                 'concatenation of the '
                                                 'checksums of its '
                                                 'top-level contained '
                                                 'objects (not recursive, '
                                                 'names not included). The '
                                                 'list of checksums is '
                                                 'sorted alphabetically '
                                                 '(hex-code) before '
                                                 'concatenation and a '
                                                 'further checksum is '
                                                 'performed on the '
                                                 'concatenated checksum '
                                                 'value. For example, if a '
                                                 'bundle contains blobs '
                                                 'with the following '
                                                 'checksums: md5(blob1) = '
                                                 '72794b6d md5(blob2) = '
                                                 '5e089d29 Then the '
                                                 'checksum of the bundle '
                                                 'is: md5( concat( sort( '
                                                 'md5(blob1), md5(blob2) ) '
                                                 ') ) = md5( concat( sort( '
                                                 '72794b6d, 5e089d29 ) ) ) '
                                                 '= md5( concat( 5e089d29, '
                                                 '72794b6d ) ) = md5( '
                                                 '5e089d2972794b6d ) = '
                                                 'f7a29a04',
                                  'items': {'$ref': 'checksum.json#/definitions/checksum'},
                                  'minItems': 1,
                                  'type': 'array'},
                    'contents': {'description': 'If not set, this '
                                                '`DrsObject` is a single '
                                                'blob. If set, this '
                                                '`DrsObject` is a bundle '
                                                'containing the listed '
                                                '`ContentsObject` s (some '
                                                'of which may be further '
                                                'nested).',
                                 'items': {'$ref': 'contents_object.json#/definitions/contents_object'},
                                 'type': 'array'},
                    'created_time': {'description': 'Timestamp of content '
                                                    'creation in RFC3339.\n'
                                                    '(This is the creation '
                                                    'time of the '
                                                    'underlying content, '
                                                    'not of the JSON '
                                                    'object.)',
                                     'format': 'date-time',
                                     'type': 'string'},
                    'description': {'description': 'A human readable '

                                                   '`DrsObject`.',
                                    'type': ['string', 'null']},
                    'id': {'description': 'An identifier unique to this '

                           'type': 'string'},
                    'mime_type': {'description': 'A string providing the '

                                                 '`DrsObject`.',
                                  'type': ['string', 'null']},
                    'name': {'description': 'A string that can be used to '
                                            'name a `DrsObject`.\n'
                                            'This string is made up of '
                                            'uppercase and lowercase '
                                            'letters, decimal digits, '
                                            'hypen, period, and underscore '
                                            '[A-Za-z0-9.-_]. See '
                                            'http://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9699919799/basedefs/V1_chap03.html#tag_03_282[portable '
                                            'filenames].',
                             'type': ['string', 'null']},
                    'self_uri': {'description': 'A drs:// hostname-based '
                                                'URI, as defined in the '
                                                'DRS documentation, that '
                                                'tells clients how to '
                                                'access this object.\n'
                                                'The intent of this field '
                                                'is to make DRS objects '
                                                'self-contained, and '
                                                'therefore easier for '
                                                'clients to store and pass '
                                                'around.  For example, if '
                                                'you arrive at this DRS '
                                                'JSON by resolving a '
                                                'compact identifier-based '
                                                'DRS URI, the `self_uri` '
                                                'presents you with a '
                                                'hostname and properly '
                                                'encoded DRS ID for use in '
                                                'subsequent `access` '
                                                'endpoint calls.',
                                 'type': 'string'},
                    'size': {'description': 'For blobs, the blob size in '

                    'updated_time': {'description': 'Timestamp of content '

cases.case_name: DRS Access expand bundle validation
cases.case_description: Validate DRS bundle when expand = True

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info has access information
cases.case_description: Validate that DRS Object Info response has access_methods field provided and that it is non-empty
cases.message: Skip this test case as access_methods is optional for a DRS Bundle

cases.case_name: DRS Object Info has access information
cases.case_description: Validate that each access_method in the access_methods field of the DRS Object Info response has atleast one of 'access_url'or 'access_id' provided
cases.message: access_methods is not provided. It is not required for a DRS Bundle
